mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, created_at, updated_at FROM order_list WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_list ( user_id, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT ol.* FROM order_list ol JOIN login_user u ON ol.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
